title: Boomiyil Lyrics Pizza 2 -The Villa Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:Boomiyil
Movie:Pizza 2 - The Villa
Music:Santhosh Narayanan
Lyrics:Arun Raja,
Singer:Pradeep Kumar

Boomiyil vaanavil poothadhey,
ennidam kadhalil pesudhey.
Unadharuginil uyir urigidum neram
Mugaoliyinil enadhu iravugal neelum,
Kaatrinil kaalgal midhakindrana,
Aayiram ennangal nenjile thondrudhey,
Un paarvayin arthangal enguthaan theduven

Thoorigai Yendhidum thendrale
Kadhalai theetinaai nenjile
Aayiram ennangal nenjile thondrudhey,
Un paarvayin arthangal enguthaan theduven

Iru vizhigalum pudhu kavidhaigal paadum,
Idhil vilundhida dhinam urangida naanum
Podhumey naalum idhu podhumey

Villa Lyrics- +1 your favorite
